text: Oro, Plata, Mata is a 1982 Filipino World War II drama movie directed by Peque Gallaga and starring Cherie Gil, Sandy Andolong, Liza Lorena, Ronnie Lazaro, Joel Torre, Jaime Fabregas. It was distributed by ABS-CBN Corporation. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:1982 war movies Category:Filipino movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Peque Gallaga
title: Oro, Plata, Mata
